page.title: 15TRANSPORT
page.content:
{TRANSPORT} Close to the growing town of Ballymena all modern methods of transport are readily availible.
{ROADS} An excellent network of roads exists to service this area.The M2 Motorway divides the area, channeling north-south traffic away from the town. The proximity of the Woodside Industrial Estate to the M2 is surely an asset. The rural roads comprise second and third class roads all well surfaced but perhaps carrying more traffic than they were designed for.
{RAILWAYS} The main Belfast-Derry rail-line stops at Ballymena. Belfast is only 40 minutes away by rail.
